      • normApplicability

        protected void normApplicability(java.util.List<ViewTransition> vTransitions,
                                 java.util.Map<ViewTransition,NormsApplicableInView> normApplicability)

        Parameters:
        vTransitions - the list of perceptions of each sensor

      • normCompliance

        protected void normCompliance(java.util.Map<ViewTransition,NormsApplicableInView> normApplicability,
                              java.util.Map<Goal,java.util.Map<ViewTransition,NormComplianceOutcomes>> normCompliance)
        Computes norms' compliance based on the norms that were applicable to each agent in the previous time step (norm applicability) and the actions that agents performed in the transition from the previous to the current time step
        Parameters:
        normApplicability - norms that were applicable in the previous tick

      • normGroupCompliance

        protected void normGroupCompliance(java.util.Map<Goal,java.util.Map<ViewTransition,NormComplianceOutcomes>> normCompliance,
                                   java.util.Map<Goal,NormGroupOutcomes> normGroupCompliance)
        Generates norm groups compliance in the current time step, in terms of each system goal and for each perceived view transition. With this aim, this method performs the following steps for each goal/view transition:
        1. it computes the joint contexts in the view, namely the contexts of those agents that perceive each other;
        2. for each computed joint context, it retrieves the norms (in fact, it just retrieves the leaf norms) that apply to that joint context, as well as which agent each norm applies to; and
        3. for each norm that applies to the joint context, it generates norm groups taking into account the compliance of each norm and the conflicts that the norm compliance lead to
        Parameters:
        normCompliance - the compliance and outcomes of norms in the current time step
        normGroupCompliance -

      • generateNormGroups

        protected void generateNormGroups(java.util.List<Norm> norms,
                                  java.util.Map<Norm,java.lang.Long> normsApplicableToAgents,
                                  Goal goal,
                                  ViewTransition vTrans,
                                  NormGroupOutcomes nGroupOutcomes)
        Generates norm groups from a combination of norms that are applicable together. Therefore, this method assumes that the norms received by parameter are applicable together in a joint context. To generate norm groups, this method computes the compliance of each norm in the norms received by parameter, as well as the number of conflicts that the norm compliance lead to
        Parameters:
        norms - the list of norms that are applicable together
        normsApplicableToAgents - a map that retrieves, for each norm, the agent to which the norm applies in the view transition
        goal - the goal in terms of which the norm group will be evaluated
        vTrans - the view transition in which the norms are applicable together
        nGroupOutcomes - the norm group outcomes where to save the information about norm groups' compliance

      • retrieveNormGroup

        protected NormGroup retrieveNormGroup(Norm n1,
                                      NormCompliance complN1,
                                      Norm n2,
                                      NormCompliance complN2)
        Returns the NormGroup that corresponds to the combination of two norms that have been fulfilled or infringed together. First, this method searches for the norm group in the norm group network. If it exists, then it retrieves it. Otherwise, it creates the new norm group adds it to the norm group network and activates it
        Parameters:
        n1 - the first norm
        complN1 - the compliance of the first norm (Fulfilled or Infringed)
        n2 - the second norm
        compl - N2 the compliance of the second norm (Fulfilled or Infringed)
        Returns:
        Returns the NormGroup that corresponds to the combination of two norms that have been fulfilled or infringed together
        See Also:
        NormGroup, NormCompliance

      • updateUtilitiesAndPerformances

        Updates norm utilities and performances based on their norm compliance in the current time step

      • extractLeafNorms

        protected java.util.List<Norm> extractLeafNorms(java.util.List<Norm> norms)
        Returns the norms in a list of norms that are leaves in the normative network. That is, norms that do not generalise any other norm, and hence have generalisation level 0
        Parameters:
        norms - the list of norms
        Returns:
        the norms in a list of norms that are leaves in the normative network. That is, norms that do not generalise any other norm, and hence have generalisation level 0
